list.title: Canvas#isClosed
list.description: Whether or not the path is closed

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#addPath
list.description: Adds a subpath to the path, and optionally applies a transform to it

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#arcTo
list.description: Draws an arc through two controls points

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#beginPath
list.description: Creates a new subpath at the current point

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#bezierCurveTo
list.description: Draws a cubic bezier curve from the current point to the specified point

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#clear
list.description: Without resetting the operations, clears the canvas

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#clearRect
list.description: Clears a rectangle at the specified point in the screen

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#clip
list.description: Clears a path out of the current path (like a mask)

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#close
list.description: Closes the last opened subpath, or closes the path if no subpaths are open

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#draw
list.description: Draws the current canvas to the terminal

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#getBounds
list.description: Gets the bounds of the path, hoping that the path is closed

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#isPointInPath
list.description: Checks if the specified point is in the path

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#isPointInStroke
list.description: Determines if the specified point is in the stroke

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#lineTo
list.description: Draws a line from the current point to the specified point

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#paint
list.description: The paint to use for rendering

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#quadraticCurveTo
list.description: Draws a quadratic bezier curve from the current point to the specified point

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#reset
list.description: Resets the path, including all the operations

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#size
list.description: The size of the canvas (The size of the terminal)

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#startPoint
list.description: The starting point of the path

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#subpathAt
list.description: Moves the current point to the specified point

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#transform
list.description: Transforms all the points in the path by the specified matrix

list.title: module:Canvas~Canvas#translate
list.description: Translates all the points in the path by the specified amount

list.title: module:Geometry~Point#equals
list.description: Determines whether or not the point is equal to another point

list.title: module:Geometry~Point#transform
list.description: Transforms the point by the given matrix

list.title: module:Geometry~Point.center
list.description: Creates a new point at the center of the terminal

list.title: module:Geometry~Point.inBounds
list.description: Determines whether or not the given point is within the bounds of the terminal

list.title: module:Geometry~Point.of
list.description: Creates a new point from the given point, size, array, or coordinates

list.title: module:Geometry~PointLike
list.description: A point-like object. Can be a Point, Size, number, array, or object with x and y properties.

list.title: module:Paint~Color#toNumber
list.description: Creates a new color from the given number

list.title: module:Paint~Color.fromNumber
list.description: Creates a color from a number

list.title: module:Paint~ConicGradient#getColorAt
list.description: Gets the color for a point in the gradient

list.title: module:Paint~Gradient#addColorStop
list.description: Adds a color stop to the gradient

list.title: module:Paint~Gradient#angle
list.description: The angle direction of the gradient (Radians)

list.title: module:Paint~Gradient#getColorFor
list.description: Gets the color for a percentage of the gradient

list.title: module:Paint~LinearGradient#getColorAt
list.description: Gets the color for a point in the gradient

list.title: module:Paint~RadialGradient#getColorAt
list.description: Gets the color for a point in the gradient
